00042 QuantMethodExprReport::QuantMethodExprReport(int numCol) {
00043     init();
00044     m_NumCol = numCol; 
00045 }
00046 
00047 QuantMethodExprReport::QuantMethodExprReport() {
00048     init();

00050 
00051 void QuantMethodExprReport::init() {
00052   
00053     m_NumCol = 0;
00054     m_ProbeSetsToReport = NULL;
00055     m_MaxNameLength = TSVREPORT_PROBESET_STRLEN;
00056     affx::TsvReport::init();
00057     // @todo: why cant we do this? -jhg
00058     // m_is_header_buffer=true;  
00059   
00060     m_summary_tsv_precision=5;
00061     m_feffects_tsv_precision=5;
00062     m_residuals_tsv_precision=5;
00063 
00064     m_DoSummary = true;
00065     m_DoFeatureEffects = true;
00066     m_DoResiduals = true;
00067     m_DoCompact = false;
00068     m_File5 = NULL;
00069     m_F5Group = NULL;
00070     m_summary_a5_group = NULL;
00071     m_feffects_a5_group = NULL;
00072     m_residuals_a5_group = NULL;
00073     m_WriteOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile = false;
00074     m_unmungePSName = false;
00075 }
00076 
00077 QuantMethodExprReport::~QuantMethodExprReport() {
00078     if (m_F5Group != NULL) {
00079         m_F5Group->close();
00080         Freez(m_F5Group);
00081     }
00082     if (m_File5 != NULL) {
00083         m_File5->close();
00084         Freez(m_File5);
00085     }
00086     affx::TsvReport::close();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void QuantMethodExprReport::setCompactFile5Format(int maxNameLength)  {
00090     std::string fileName = Fs::join(m_dir_path,m_file_prefix + ".summaries.a5");
00091     m_File5 = TsvReport::openA5File(fileName, true);
00092     m_group_name ="/";
00093     m_MaxNameLength = maxNameLength;
00094     m_F5Group = m_File5->openGroup(m_group_name,affx::FILE5_CREATE|affx::FILE5_OPEN);
00095     m_a5_shared_group = m_F5Group;
00096     m_summary_tsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_F5Group);
00097     m_feffects_tsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_F5Group);
00098     m_residuals_tsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_F5Group);
00099     m_file_prefix="/";
00100     m_format = TsvReport::FMT_A5;
00101     m_DoCompact = true;
00102     m_summary_a5_group = m_F5Group;
00103     m_feffects_a5_group = m_F5Group;
00104     m_residuals_a5_group = m_F5Group;
00105 }
00106 
00107 bool QuantMethodExprReport::prepare(QuantMethod &qMethod, const IntensityMart &iMart) {
00108     // printf("### QuantMethodExprReport: '%s'\n",m_file_name.c_str());
00109     std::string delim = ".";
00110     if (m_DoCompact) {
00111         delim = "";
00112     }
00113 
00114     if (m_DoSummary) {
00115         copyOptionsTo(m_summary_tsv);
00116         m_summary_tsv.setFilename(m_file_prefix + delim + "summary");
00117         m_summary_tsv.addHeadersFrom(m_header_buffer);
00118         m_summary_tsv.setPrecision(m_summary_tsv_precision);
00119         m_summary_tsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_summary_a5_group);
00120         m_summary_tsv.setFormat(m_format);
00121     }
00122     if (m_DoFeatureEffects) {
00123         copyOptionsTo(m_feffects_tsv);
00124         m_feffects_tsv.setFilename(m_file_prefix+ delim + "feature-response");
00125         m_feffects_tsv.addHeadersFrom(m_header_buffer);
00126         m_feffects_tsv.setPrecision(m_feffects_tsv_precision);
00127         m_feffects_tsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_feffects_a5_group);
00128         m_feffects_tsv.setFormat(m_format);
00129     }
00130     if (m_DoResiduals) {
00131         copyOptionsTo(m_residuals_tsv);
00132         m_residuals_tsv.setFilename(m_file_prefix+ delim + "residuals");
00133         m_residuals_tsv.addHeadersFrom(m_header_buffer);
00134         m_residuals_tsv.setPrecision(m_residuals_tsv_precision);
00135         m_residuals_tsv.setA5SharedGroup(m_residuals_a5_group);
00136         m_residuals_tsv.setFormat(m_format); 
00137     }
00138 
00139     // fix names
00140     std::vector<std::string> col_names=iMart.getCelFileNames();
00141     for (size_t i=0;i<col_names.size();i++) {
00142         col_names[i]=Fs::basename(col_names[i]);
00143     }
00144 
00145     // summary
00146     if (m_DoSummary) {
00147         m_summary_tsv.defineStringColumn(0,0,"probeset_id",m_MaxNameLength);
00148         if (m_DoCompact) {
00149             m_summary_tsv.defineColumns(col_names,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_FLOAT,0);
00150         }
00151         else {
00152             m_summary_tsv.defineColumns(col_names,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE,0);
00153         }
00154         //
00155         m_summary_tsv.writeTsv_v1();
00156     }
00157 
00158     // feffects => feature effects
00159     if (m_DoFeatureEffects) {
00160         if (m_WriteOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile) {
00161             if (m_feffects_tsv.m_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5) {
00162                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,0,"probe_id",             affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00163                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"feature_response",     affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00164                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,2,"probeset_id",          affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, m_MaxNameLength);
00165             } 
00166             else {
00167                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"atom_id"          ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00168                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,2,"probe_id",        affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00169                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,3,"x"                ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00170                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,4,"y"                ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00171                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,5,"feature_response",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00172  
00173             }
00174         } 
00175         else { 
00176             if (m_feffects_tsv.m_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5) {
00177                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,0,"probe_id",             affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00178                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"feature_response",     affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00179                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,2,"probeset_id",          affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, m_MaxNameLength);
00180                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,3,"allele_id",            affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00181                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,4,"context_id",           affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00182                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,5,"channel_id",           affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00183             } 
00184             else {
00185                 m_feffects_tsv.defineStringColumn(0,0,"probeset_id",m_MaxNameLength);
00186                 //m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"atom_id"          ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00187                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"probe_id",        affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00188                 //m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,3,"x"                ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00189                 //m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,4,"y"                ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00190                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,2,"feature_response",affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00191                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,3,"allele_id",       affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00192                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,4,"context_id",      affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00193                 m_feffects_tsv.defineColumn(0,5,"channel_id",      affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00194             }
00195         }
00196         m_feffects_tsv.writeTsv_v1();
00197 
00198     }
00199 
00200 
00201 
00202     // residuals
00203     if (m_DoResiduals) {
00204         m_residuals_tsv.defineStringColumn(0,0,"probeset_id",m_MaxNameLength);
00205     
00206         m_residuals_tsv.defineColumn(0,1,"atom_id"    ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00207         m_residuals_tsv.defineColumn(0,2,"probe_id"   ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00208         m_residuals_tsv.defineColumn(0,3,"x"          ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00209         m_residuals_tsv.defineColumn(0,4,"y"          ,affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT);
00210     
00211         for (size_t i=0;i<col_names.size();i++) {
00212             m_residuals_tsv.defineColumn(0,5+i,col_names[i],affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE);
00213         }
00214     
00215         m_residuals_tsv.writeTsv_v1();
00216     }
00217 
00218   
00219     return true;
00220 }
00221 
00222 
00223 bool QuantMethodExprReport::report(ProbeSetGroup &psGroup,
00224                                    QuantMethod &qMethod,
00225                                    const IntensityMart &iMart, 
00226                                    std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans,
00227                                    PmAdjuster &pmAdjust) {
00228  
00229  
00230     QuantExprMethod* qeMethod = dynamic_cast<QuantExprMethod *>(&qMethod);
00231     if (qeMethod == NULL) {
00232         Err::errAbort("Can't call QuantMethodExprReport::report() with something other than a QuantExprMethod.");
00233     }
00234     int targetCount = qeMethod->getNumTargets();
00235 
00236     /* We only report expression and copynumber probe sets. */
00237     if (psGroup.probeSets[0]->psType != ProbeSet::Expression && psGroup.probeSets[0]->psType != ProbeSet::Copynumber) {
00238         return false;
00239     }
00240 
00241     if (m_ProbeSetsToReport != NULL)
00242         if (m_ProbeSetsToReport->find(psGroup.name)==m_ProbeSetsToReport->end())
00243             return false;
00244 
00245     if (m_DoSummary) {
00246         // summary
00247                 if (psGroup.displayName != NULL && strlen(psGroup.displayName) > 0)
00248                         m_summary_tsv.set_string(0,0,psGroup.displayName);
00249                 else
00250                         m_summary_tsv.set_string(0,0,psGroup.name);
00251         for (int i = 0; i < targetCount; i++) {
00252             if (m_DoCompact) {
00253                 m_summary_tsv.set_f(0,1+i,(float)qeMethod->getSignalEstimate(i));
00254             }
00255             else {
00256                 m_summary_tsv.set_d(0,1+i,qeMethod->getSignalEstimate(i));
00257             }
00258         }
00259         m_summary_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00260     }
00261 
00262     // populate the map of id to names.
00263 
00264     std::map<int,std::string> probeToPsName;
00265     std::map<int,int> probeToAtom;
00266     std::map<int,int> probeToAllele;
00267     std::map<int,int> probeToContext;
00268     std::map<int,int> probeToChannel;
00269 
00270     std::map<int,std::string> probeToPsNameFE;
00271     std::map<int,int> probeToAtomFE;
00272     std::map<int,int> probeToAlleleFE;
00273     std::map<int,int> probeToContextFE;
00274     std::map<int,int> probeToChannelFE;
00275   
00276     if (m_DoResiduals || m_DoFeatureEffects) {
00277         for (uint32_t gIx = 0; gIx < psGroup.probeSets.size(); gIx++) {
00278             const ProbeSet *ps = psGroup.probeSets[gIx];
00279             for (uint32_t aIx = 0; aIx < ps->atoms.size(); aIx++) {
00280                 Atom *a = ps->atoms[aIx];
00281                 for (uint32_t pIx = 0; pIx < a->probes.size(); pIx++) {
00282                     Probe *p = a->probes[pIx];
00283 
00284                     probeToPsName[p->id] = ps->name;
00285                     probeToAtom[p->id] = a->id;
00286                     probeToAllele[p->id] = a->getAlleleCode();
00287                     probeToContext[p->id] = a->getContextCode();
00288                     probeToChannel[p->id] = a->getChannelCode();
00289 
00290                     //  We need to have a separate set of maps for feature effects where the apid is used
00291                     //  since two probes with the same p->id could be in the same probeset.    
00292                     int apid = p->getApid();
00293                     probeToPsNameFE[apid] = ps->name;
00294                     probeToAtomFE[apid] = a->id;
00295                     probeToAlleleFE[apid] = a->getAlleleCode();
00296                     probeToContextFE[apid] = a->getContextCode();
00297                     probeToChannelFE[apid] = a->getChannelCode();
00298                 }
00299             }
00300         }
00301     }
00302 
00303     if (m_DoFeatureEffects) {
00304         // @todo: put code here.
00305         for (int featureIx = 0; featureIx < qeMethod->getNumFeatures(); featureIx++) {
00306             if (qeMethod->featureUsed(featureIx)) {
00307                 const Probe *p = qeMethod->getFeature(featureIx);
00308                 assert(p);
00309                 if (m_WriteOldStyleFeatureEffectsFile) {
00310                     unsigned int x,y;
00311                     ChipLayout::indexToXY(p->id, m_NumCol, x, y); 
00312 
00313                     if (m_feffects_tsv.m_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5) {
00314                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,0,FROM_ZEROBASED(p->id));
00315                         m_feffects_tsv.set_d(0,1,qeMethod->getFeatureEffect(featureIx));
00316                         m_feffects_tsv.set_string(0,2,probeToPsName[p->id]);
00317                         m_feffects_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00318                     } 
00319                     else {
00320                         m_feffects_tsv.set_string(0,0,probeToPsName[p->id]);
00321                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,1,probeToAtom[p->id]);
00322                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,2,FROM_ZEROBASED(p->id));
00323                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,3,x);
00324                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,4,y);
00325                         m_feffects_tsv.set_d(0,5,qeMethod->getFeatureEffect(featureIx));
00326                         m_feffects_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00327                     }                        
00328                 } 
00329                 else {
00330                     std::string probesetName = probeToPsNameFE[p->getApid()];
00331                     if (m_unmungePSName && 
00332                         (probesetName.rfind("-A") == probesetName.length()-2 || 
00333                          probesetName.rfind("-B") == probesetName.length()-2)
00334                         ) {
00335                         probesetName.erase(probesetName.length()-2);
00336                     }
00337                     if (m_feffects_tsv.m_format == affx::TsvReport::FMT_A5) {     
00338                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,0,FROM_ZEROBASED(p->id));
00339                         m_feffects_tsv.set_d(0,1,qeMethod->getFeatureEffect(featureIx));
00340                         m_feffects_tsv.set_string(0,2,probesetName);
00341                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,3,probeToAlleleFE[p->getApid()]);
00342                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,4,probeToContextFE[p->getApid()]);
00343                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,5,probeToChannelFE[p->getApid()]);
00344                         m_feffects_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00345                     } 
00346                     else {
00347                         m_feffects_tsv.set_string(0,0,probesetName);
00348                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,1,FROM_ZEROBASED(p->id));
00349                         m_feffects_tsv.set_d(0,2,qeMethod->getFeatureEffect(featureIx));
00350                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,3,probeToAlleleFE[p->getApid()]);
00351                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,4,probeToContextFE[p->getApid()]);
00352                         m_feffects_tsv.set_i(0,5,probeToChannelFE[p->getApid()]);
00353                         m_feffects_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00354                     }
00355                 }
00356             }
00357         }
00358     }
00359 
00360     if (m_DoResiduals) {
00361         for (int featureIx = 0; featureIx < qeMethod->getNumFeatures(); featureIx++) {
00362             if (qeMethod->featureUsed(featureIx)) {
00363                 const Probe *p = qeMethod->getFeature(featureIx);
00364                 assert(p);
00365                 unsigned int x,y;
00366                 ChipLayout::indexToXY(p->id, m_NumCol, x, y);
00367         
00368                 m_residuals_tsv.set_string(0,0,probeToPsName[p->id]);
00369         
00370                 m_residuals_tsv.set_i(0,1,probeToAtom[p->id]);
00371                 m_residuals_tsv.set_i(0,2,p->id+1);
00372                 m_residuals_tsv.set_i(0,3,x);
00373                 m_residuals_tsv.set_i(0,4,y);
00374         
00375                 for (int chipIx = 0; chipIx < qeMethod->getNumTargets(); chipIx++) {
00376                     m_residuals_tsv.set_d(0,5+chipIx,qeMethod->getResidual(featureIx, chipIx));
00377                 }
00378         
00379                 m_residuals_tsv.writeLevel(0);
00380             }
00381         }
00382     }
00383   
00384     return true;
00385 }
00386 
00387 bool QuantMethodExprReport::finish(QuantMethod &qMethod) {
00388     //
00389     m_summary_tsv.close();
00390     if (m_DoFeatureEffects) {m_feffects_tsv.close();}
00391     if (m_DoResiduals) {m_residuals_tsv.close();}
00392     //
00393     close();
00394     //
00395     return true;
00396 }
